title: Robyn Stern and Body Dysmorphic Disorder
description:
Robyn Stern is a licensed Cognitive Behavioral Therapist who once suffered from body dysmorphic disorder (BDD) and now helps others who do. Robyn details her struggle with BDD, the treatment strategies that worked for her, and what inspired her to use her own experiences to help others. She explains how to recognize BDD, what to do if you suspect that someone you love is suffering from BDD, and where to get help. Plus, Lala shares deets from her Labor Day weekend yacht cruise, some thoughts about Bethanny Frankel’s rant on the Kardashians, the new TV obsession she’s sharing with her mom, and Ocean’s latest milestone!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
